brst.description: BRST is a token in the tron network, which allows its holders to generate returns in TRX thanks to staking, energy rental, an additional 10% of what is generated by all Brutus Energy Bot providers and automatic compound interest. All this makes profits grow exponentially, fully automated.
brst.unStaking: A uma ordem no processo de retirada (UnStaking) para os próximos {{days}} dias, uma vez que esse período tenha terminado, retorne e resgate os TRX correspondentes

renergy: Please confirm the transaction from your wallet
renergy1: We are waiting for the blockchain to process and confirm your transfer. This can take from 3 seconds to 1 minute
renergy2: We are verifying that the amounts and the address to which the funds were sent are the correct address, please do not close or exit the website as this may affect this process.
renergy3: Please do not close or leave the page as this will cause an error in the energy allocation.
compra: Your TRX automatic staking has started
nonEfective: The transaction has failed, you have connection problems or you have taken too long to sign, this has made the transaction unsuccessful, try again
errGreater: Please enter an amount greater than {{min}} TRX
errFunds: You do not have enough funds in your account you place at least {{min}} TRX
donate: Thanks for Donate to grow BRST
Thank you for contributing to this great project that we have done to help the community grow. We truly appreciate it ❤️

request: Come back when time is up and claim your TRX
brst.calcullatorText: This calculator uses the average of the last {{days}} days of earnings to generate an estimate that is closest to reality, since earnings can fluctuate from one day to the next and are not fixed but variable.

eTronlink: If you have TRONLINK installed, please open the application and connect. If you do not have it, you must download the TRONLINK extension for your browser or TRONLINK GLOBAL from your cell phone.
soldOut: We apologize that at this time we have sold all the available energy, please come back later when we have recovered
eRange: Please enter a range of values between 1 hour and 14 days
alert.eRange2: It is only available for 1 hour operations
eResource: At this time we do not have resources available, please try again later.
noFounds: Please top up your wallet with additional TRX to complete this operation.
